code:
module TopModule (
    input wire clk,
    input wire load,
    input wire [1:0] ena,
    input wire [99:0] data,
    output reg [99:0] q
);

    // Initial state of q
    initial begin
        q = 100'b0;
    end

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (load) begin
            q <= data;
        end else begin
            case (ena)
                2'b01: q <= {q[0], q[99:1]}; // Rotate right
                2'b10: q <= {q[98:0], q[99]}; // Rotate left
                default: q <= q; // No operation
            endcase
        end
    end

endmodule
